The current screen shows the "Manage locations" page with three entries: '巴黎' (Paris), '上海' (Shanghai), and a coordinate entry. Based on typical drag-and-drop behavior in Android lists, I should press and hold near the center of the '上海' item (e.g., x ≈ 500, y ≈ 320) and drag it to a position above '巴黎' (e.g., y ≈ 200), keeping x roughly the same.
